Prompt Engineering = Writing text msg to LLM. Include info on role, examples, constraints to get better results. Prompt: "Find the best restaurant in India" can give results that are not very helpful to you. Refined: "You are a travel expert[Role]. Find restaurants similar to Namaste[Example]. Price per dish less than 500 INR[Constraint]" Context Engineering = PE(LLM) + Memory(preferences) + RAG(relevance) + StateManagement(step by step guidance). It enriches the input prompt making the results more personalised. Thank you for the easy explanation.
